content.detailedDescription: While driving in a road behind route 1&9 i saw in a distance what i thought was 2 helicopters or small planes coming in my direction.I looked around and saw the airplanes in there normal route.Where i live you could see the planes that are going to newark airport.When i looked back to the red-orange lights i figured i had never seeing any craft with that type of light.As they where getting closer i stop my car and put down my window to hear any noise. to my surprise there was nothing.I stood there looking to see if they where lanterns but i was very windy and they did not shake or changed there course.They were flying in the same direction, at the same speed and same altitud side by side.After i saw them 2 getting lost behind the clouds i looked and there was 3 more coming they looked so big and i new then it was something weird.The 3 where flying in a triangle formation.I was thinking the airplanes passing in the opposite direction must have seeing them too.Now i know there is something or some one else out there.I have try to search the internet to see if some one else saw them too.I mean there's alot of cars passing by and there is couple traffic lights in that area.I love watching the sky day or night and now i have one more reason to keep looking up any opportunity i have.
content.summary: Saw 5 orange- red round lights flying from ne to sw then lost them in the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work and happened to be outside durning my break.I just happened to look up at the night sky looking at the stars. when something caught my eye. i wasnt sure what i saw in the sky. i thuoght it was an airplane at first.The object in question was flying from left to right. i thought it was a plane. then inoticed it didnt have a flashing light like a plane would have. i watched it go across the the sky, all of a sudden it stopped in mid flight. it hovered for about a minute or two. then the object it flew towards my direction, stopped then flew right to left.
 i didnt know what to think. i was not sure what i had just seen.I was pretty sure that it wasnt a plane. i lost sight of it because it was flying behind trees. also i was limited to one area .I could only go so far. i am pretty sure it wasnt a plane,because when the object was going in the other direction a plane happened to be flying in the oppisite direction of the object in question.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw something in the sky. they way it was flying it didnt seem to be a plane.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up and leaning on my elbo and beside me was a circular disk i tried to adjust my eyes to see it better and then i think it realized i was now awake something now was in my body spiritlike.  as it left it told me telepathhically "am leaving now" and all this time i had a feeling of euphoric.Your truly ray byron
content.summary: Spirit like and a disc

content.detailedDescription: Arriving home at approx 1930 and witnessed two glowing orange orbs traveling from north to south.  called roommate to observe.  at this point the first two had traveled overhead and one had disappeared.  we observed five more of the same objects cross over our heads.  i commented maybe they were lanterns but my roomate pointed out they were not traveling with the wind.  there was no sound.  it was very odd.
content.summary: Glowing orange orbs traveling north to south then fading

content.detailedDescription: Arriving home at approx 1930 and witnessed two glowing orange orbs traveling from north to south.  called roommate to observe.  at this point the first two had traveled overhead and one had disappeared.  we observed five more of the same objects cross over our heads.  i commented maybe they were lanterns but my roomate pointed out they were not traveling with the wind.  there was no sound.  it was very odd.
content.summary: Glowing orange orbs traveling north to south then fading

content.detailedDescription:
Around four nights a week my friend and i look into the nights sky for one to two hours as its amazing and we do see some things up there.

on tuesday 15/10/2013 around 2.30am we saw the tranparent shape moving at a speed of ?? with no lights at all.

he saw the ufo first then told me to look look look and pointed. i looked  in his direction and saw the ufo moving fast, then i looked away as i just wanted to go inside.   

he watched it fly deep into the sky and out of sight.

my feelings are all over the place. 

has any one else seen this??
content.summary: No lights, it was transparent but the outline was like a triangle shape, but the three points of the triangle were rounded instead of pointed.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on airport rd toward 100th st sw in a convertible at approx 5:15 pm when i saw a missile launch from some distance away due south of my position. it left a con trail from the ground and went straight up into the sky. this was not an aircraft con trail coming or going, this went right up into the sky and didn't stop until i could no longer see it.
content.summary: From everett looking south there was a missle launch going streight up leaving a con trail from the ground into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my mom were driving away from chicago and were near midway airport. ever since my first few ufo sightings i now am constantly scanning the sky and observing planes closely, i saw a plane off in the distance that looked like it was very high but still acending, i got my binoculars to examine it closer and i noticed a white object with some gray on its underside following with the plane as it gained altitude. it was going at exactly the same speed as the plane and was following by its left wing (my right) maybe a bit behind. however we started to go past some trees and i lost sight of the object, however in the time the plane should have come past the trees i noticed it wasnt there. even when the trees cleared i couldn't find it. it had been coming in my direction and should have still been in my view a little farther in the sky by this time but it was no where to be found.

is there a lot of ufo activity in this area? this is the second time i noticed a ufo in the area near midway airport and near chicago. let me know what you think. this is the very first ufo sighting i have personally had that involved something moving and not only that but a plane disappearing as well, definitely something strange going on. also even though my mom was with me at the time she didn't see it since it all happened quite quickly.

also this happened in the afternoon
content.summary: White round ufo following plane

content.detailedDescription: I live in a very rural parish (county) out in the country. i was sitting on my front porch just after dusk, facing west and was witnessing an lightning display in a lone thunderhead. decided to walk out to my driveway to get a better look and started videoing the event with my iphone. i was concentrating on my screen and my focus on the lightning display and there was a flash that occurred while videoing. (i remember something but thought it may have been lightning or a shooting star???) didnt think much about it until later that night i emailed it to my computer and downloaded it. i sent it to a couple of friends, which one suggested i send it to a woman in town that works for a digital advertising company. she called me over that weekend after she reviewed it on her home computer and asked me who i go this from (she was skeptical). she took it to her office and called me the following week and said she reviewed it on her work computer and it was authentic. no variation in the pixels from frame to frame, so there was no altering. she explained that an iphone video has about 31 frames per second. this object enters the field of view from the right bottom, goes behind a cloud's edge (not the cloud with the lightning) turns or banks towards the camera, then banks or turns upward in front of the thunder head and leaves the field of view. she said it was in either 11 or 12 frames, or about 1/3 of second, in which this object traveled at least several miles. i would estimate the cloud that the object went around was at least 5 miles away. she also informed me that there is a humming noise she could hear on her hifi stereo at work.(i can hear it better on my iphone than my dell laptop) this noise is heard just as the object appears in the distance and stops before it banks upward. this presents an issue in that it is certainly traveling faster than the speed of sound yet the noise the object emits stops before the objects passes. it also seems to change shape slightly as it banks, etc, like wings appear then dissapear. the object leaves a slight trail which can be seen with a high grade monitor. it looks like  disturbed atmosphere wake, rather than a comet or falling star trail. i have sent it to the lsu astronomy dept and they have no explanation. they sent it to alaska and france to astronomy experts. no help there either. lsu and their experts have ruled out sprites, elfs, tgf's, blue jets, etc. i will attach an unedited, a slow motion, and several slides from the video she gave me.
content.summary: Not much of an event when filmed, occurred too quickly.

content.detailedDescription: At 1:30 am i was heading onto the freeway and i noticed something bright to my left and looked. at first i thought it was a huge star or some type of military base object. all of a sudden it shot up like a shooting star but then shot down and back to where it was. it was a second ordeal. thats when my heart stopped. im going 60 on the freeway and some type of energy made me keep looking at it not letting me pay attention to the roadi knew at this moment this wasnt something normal.I thought i was going crazy. i had to keep rubbing my eyes thinking maybe i was just making this up. then it started following me! i called my friend immediately. i told them what was happening they told me to stay on the phone that maybe they where using my radioactive waves. my phone kept dropping calls. on top of that at one point my phone turned off and i turned it back on and a thing on my phone popped up asking me if id like to turn on my cellular connection. well duh its a cellphone why would a message pop up like that? i knew it was following me because i lived 40 minutes away and it followed me for that long. every exit i got off of. you know how when your driving at night and you see the north star or the moon? well you take different exits and roads and the side that moon is on changes side from side from the direction your going. well this object stayed on my passenger side. when i stopped it stopped. i got out of my car and stopped at a gas station asked a random lady look am i crazy is this object moving? at first she said no and looked down and i said please mam please look again and she did and she said holy s**t its coming in our direction. i told the woman what was happening and she said leave it alone stop watching as long as it wasn't hurting us. but i couldn't let go. it sounds super crazy and i still feel crazy but it was like something was watching me and it was listening to me. no happy feeling. i felt danger. oh i forgot to  tell you this all started over lake erie. water. i felt like it was tapping into my phone call i felt a strike of energy through out my body. like it knew i was intrigued so they took advantage of me watching. i lost contact don't ask me how its like i cant remember. i woke up not remembering. i didn't tell you the weirdest part. you know how i told you about my cell phone going crazy well when i went into my house i went to turn on my mudroom light and it didn't work. i thought my mom was playing a joke on me making fun of me. i kept trying to flick the switch a hundred times. so i went upstairs in the dark and flicked the switch that works as well for the same room and it worked. so i was like what so i went back and tried the other switch that wasn't working and it turned on. like some energy through my fingertips. i also wanted to mention another reason i knew it was no airplane helicopter radar thing or military thing was because while i was on the free way it had 3 random bolts of lighting come from the top very quickly. like some type of radiation thing. i felt like i saw one streak of lighting bolt underneath as well very light. i never felt like this before. i don't connect people for such things. but with this i felt like i needed to talk to someone about it. someone who understands and doesn't think i'm crazy.
content.summary: Needs to be talked about. uncomfortable.

content.detailedDescription: Since march of 2013 i have observed this object and several others like it at my location.  i have video taped it and can provide that video.  in addition i have observed this object with binoculars.  i speculate it is military in origin.  i contacted the faa in louisville ky, and they did respond and state that there was activity taking place approximately 10 miles from my house, but did not state what type of activity.  this object is present almost every night at the same time, but the location has changed as the year has progressed.  i did notice a reduction of objects when i reported to faa, but they have since returned.  thought you guys might want to take a look at the video and see if you could tell me exactly what this device is i am observing.  i would like to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Have been observing this object since march 2013 almost on nightly basis.  i have detailed video i can provide and have contacted faa as well

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on our 800 square foot terrace downtown denver around 845pm when i noticed a v shaped ufo, dark in color, with 5 distinct blu-ish/white-ish round energy lights glowing below the craft.  there was no sound and the ufo was approximately a mile wide.  it came from the north heading south.  i am an avid cell phone picture taker, but couldnt turn around to grab either my cell or my wifes cell sitting 2 feet from me.  i felt like something was preventing me from grabbing my cell(just a feeling).  i watched the ufo fly away as though i had seen the craft before.  as it flew away, i noticed the back left tail light vere away from the craft and headed into the center of the ufo then back out to its original position.   when the event was over apprx 20 seconds into it, i googled v shaped ufo and noticed the craft instantly.   this was an event that will be embedded in my soul for ever.  we need answers people.  we are in the dark about everything.  it is our right to know what is going on.  besides, we pay the people hidding the information from us.  i understand that the government has its duty to protect us, but from what?  let's stand united in our search.  we the people will prevail.
content.summary: V shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Bright blue/green light behind clouds that moved.  also gave off a glow.
content.summary: Bright blue/green light behind clouds that moved.  also gave off a glow.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a shadow directly above, noticed radio went static, and felt massive vibration or rumble, .  
saw light circul r pinkish pulsating and floored it, no chance kept moving away but noticed to more objects identical to the first light that passed ver head and that's wen i saw it was one huge object. last i saw it was ahead of me directly north, then it looked to rocket as if by spring toward the southeast to my right so fast that all i saw was a streak of light.
content.summary: Big shadow flew over while driving observed long as in view

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hot tub with a friend at 3:00pm daytime, when i saw a bright light come straight down, then take a sharp right angle & disappear behind an island less than one mile from shore. lights don't normally travel like that. there was no sound. it traveled fast. i researched the internet to see where i could report it, but found nothing. i knew it was the strangest light i've ever seen in my life. i rubbed my eyes to make sure i wasn't seeing things, but i really saw it.
content.summary: Bright light came down from sky, then turned at right angle behind island 1 mile from shore

content.detailedDescription:
I took our dog out before bed time at around 1:20 a.M. on october 14, 2013. i observed a red, white, and green brightly lit object in the western sky moving from north to south then back again. it appeared to be going in a circular pattern. 

in recent months, i have seen a bluish green shooting star and also what i believe is a satellite in the sky west of our home. my eyes now automatically scan the skies in that direction. however, on the morning of october 14, 2013 i saw something unlike anything i had seen before.

i ran back in to grab my video camera and yelled for my wife, who came outside immediately. our next door neighbor was on her front porch smoking a cigarette. the three of us watched the object moving and hovering.

we surmised that it was nothing more than a remote controlled aircraft. then, just for our own peace of mind, got into our car and went searching for anyone outside who might be flying such a craft. in the meantime, the object had disappeared from sight.

we drove around the neighborhood and around the area but found no one outside or any evidence of any activity. this is when everything started to point to something besides our initial assumptions.

the most unsettling thing about the experience is not knowing or having the answers. we have video footage, such as it is, and will gladly share it with you for the sake of research.
content.summary: Object appeared due west of our home as red, white, and green lights. shape appeared to be circular mostly.

content.detailedDescription: 1. if the back yard on deck having coffee. 2. just watching the birds fly over. 3. plane. 4. travels at a steady pace from north to south. no change indirection just traveling across the sky. it's a silver tube. no wings, that's what made me continue to look at it, i was trying to see wings, like the other planes i would see in the sky. no wings. 5. at first, cool, i saw a ufo. but it's been back. the first time  was late august. then it appeared again last week. wednesday & thursday.  october 9 & 10. i took some pictures. i brought my decent camera out after i  took a pic w/my ipad, and it was a dot in the sky. i took 4pics on thursday then i took 1 this morning.. my reactions are what the hell is it? my 2 conclusions are aliens or the government..6. it just flew out of site, same rate of seed north tomsouth. always north to south.
content.summary: A silver tube. close up foto looks like separation in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: 1. if the back yard on deck having coffee. 2. just watching the birds fly over. 3. plane. 4. travels at a steady pace from north to south. no change indirection just traveling across the sky. it's a silver tube. no wings, that's what made me continue to look at it, i was trying to see wings, like the other planes i would see in the sky. no wings. 5. at first, cool, i saw a ufo. but it's been back. the first time  was late august. then it appeared again last week. wednesday & thursday.  october 9 & 10. i took some pictures. i brought my decent camera out after i  took a pic w/my ipad, and it was a dot in the sky. i took 4pics on thursday then i took 1 this morning.. my reactions are what the hell is it? my 2 conclusions are aliens or the government..6. it just flew out of site, same rate of seed north tomsouth. always north to south.
content.summary: A silver tube. close up foto looks like separation in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: Thought it was a planet, but seemed too big...Initially thought jupiter, satern...Sky was very clear but looked too large...Then noticed it was flashing....Took out binoculars,  and saw a voiolet ring around it and it was pulsating colours....Green, red, orange, yellow etc.....Green and red were more prominent.  was not plane, stayed stationary until we all went to bed....We watched a 2 planes pass it....Not at all the same in appearance. i star gaze on manitoulin island and have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Watched several hours before bed with naked eye and binoculars,  3 other witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving home with wife around 10 pm eastern time.
2. they took up a big portion of the viewable sky and they were hovering and pretty bright so they were noticeable.
3. individually they appeared to be almost like planes but they were flying in close proximity to one another and kept formation. also the light they emitted looked like they were almost like led lights
4. they looked like a group of 6-10 objects flying in formation. they kept their distances to one another. they were blinking all the while - the light colors were purple, blue, red, and white. 
5. we were puzzled by the lights. they didn't look like anything we've ever seen, considering that in this area we normally see a lot of flying objects. we don't normally see objects that switch positions and can't imagine seeing ones that do it so quickly while stopping on a dime as they do it either. 
6. we got out of the car to try to tail them until they were indistinguishable. 
unfortunately we didn't have a camera and weren't able to capture any documentation.
content.summary: Flashing lights in loose formation, some switching places and some  staying in precise proximity to one another flying northwest at a steady rate.

content.detailedDescription: My husband saw green ligth, glow, apprear in sky, horizontal, from east to west, too fast, while we were at home, our windows were open and we can see the sky. it was less than one second. at 9 pm. we believe was a meteor, but the strange was color: glow green. inmediatelly, we check twitter: the ligth was see also in spain and manhattan.
content.summary: Green ligth, glow, apprear in sky, horizontal, from east to west, too fast

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on sicklerville road about a mile from my home just past dusk.  a bright star caught my attention and i looked up.  but then i noticed something else.  it looked like a somewhat brightly colored parachute that also twinkled with all sorts of colors.  and it hovered and descended just like a parachute.  it was very intriguing.  i couldn't take my eyes off it.  but then i noticed another object to the right.  i would have to say that they were identical and they both were hovering and descending at the same rate.  i thought about stopping the car to take a few pictures, but i'm sure the pictures would just show a couple dots of light.  because they seemed to be very far away and my phone camera is not what you would call state of the art.  so i drove on and soon they were behind me as the road turned.  but i haven't stop thinking about what i had just saw.  so i found your website and decided to report it.  i'm sure i'm not the only one to lay eyes on these objects, whatever they may be, and i bet there are a lot of other folks out there wondering about them.
content.summary: Parachute like objects that seemed to hover and descend. the objects glowed and twinkled many colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Bright light in the sky.  we see many of them around here on occasion.  my aunt louise was getting ready for bed around 2:00 am (early in the morning of 10/14) and she noticed a bright light out of the window.  she didn't think anything of it, when in her room changed, and the light was still outside of the window. by this time she had looked through the window two times, but it never left or moved from the original position. she opened the full view door and noticed it just sat there very bright but would expand a bright light and then retract to almost nothing. at one point it would turn orange and then back to bright white, and then it would grow very large, then retract back to nothing
 this happened several times before she went into her sister's room, woke her up to come and look at it. they grabbed the binoculars to see if they could a better look.  after looking through the binoculars they noticed that the object also had little orange dot lights all the way around it, and still it had not moved.  then the orange lights would go away, and the white light would retract to the point of not being able to see, and it would come back again with the same orange lights wrapped around it and then it totally disappeared.  it was no longer seen after that.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky not moving, but would disappear and come back.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in north central florida.
i was watching the baseball game friday night oct 11, 2013 & went out on the back porch for a cigarette. as soon as i sat at the table i saw 4 maybe 5 orange / red lights traveling in a line above the trees. i freaked!

i ran over & banged on the window to get my wife's attention. she came out, i pointed to the lights as i ran & grabbed my video camera. she said " wow, that's not a plane." i went out into the yard to avoid the screens on the pourch & the bright light on the barn next door.

the lights were very far away & probably 4 or 5 times larger than a star. they were traveling slowly. they came up above the trees out of the nw and were going at a slight angle to the north.

as they ascended, the upper most light faded away as did the others as they got to the same spot in the sky. i thought that was it, but a few minutes later, it started again. first one light then another. only 3 this time.

they didn���t fade as quickly this time & seemed to reach a certain altitude then started heading north. the spacing between them also grew as they started north.They may have changed to a bluish color as they faded away this time. (it was hard to tell as i was focused on the screen of the video camera).

i have worked on military aircraft in the past, worked on the flight line at night & was at sea. no way were these lights from any type of plane or helicopter.

i wish i had a tripod!
content.summary: 4 orange lights rising from the horizon in a straight line. they slowly faded away, but the even started again a few minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were on the motorcycle following another friend on their bike as well. we saw the object which at first appeared to be a meteor...But did not disappear. instead of disintegrating into nothing, like a meteor would do, it split off into 4 lights and they would flicker on & off and they all started making formations. none of the lights seemed to be effected by gravity. they would move around a bit higher and a bit lower. sometimes in a line and sometimes not. we were still driving down a very populated highway when they eventually vanished. they whole event may have lasted about 2-3 minutes.
content.summary: Large white light split into 4--hovering in different formations. lights on & off

content.detailedDescription: N/a
content.summary: Red flashing light with white lights / windows in a circular pattern

content.detailedDescription:
i live on the north edge of adrian, michigan, usa.  went outside last night with my camera and tripod to try to capture at least part of the path of the international space station as it traversed 40 degrees up from the horizon, from wnw to ne.  i'd watched it two nights earlier, when it was 81 degrees up, but was not able to really capture it with my camera that night, and realized i was zooming in too much, and hadn't gotten out there early enough to do justice to the camera settings, and kind of figured out what i'd need to do to get some better shots if i could try again.  that was friday night, 10/11/13.
   sunday night, i knew from the nasa website that the station would be visible at 7:45 pm in the location and direction described above.  i have a canon sx50 hs camera, with a maximum time exposure shutter speed of 15 seconds.  at 15 seconds, i can get stars, and my hope was to get stars, and to photograph the station as a line of light across the sky.  i didn't zoom in much, because i wanted to make sure to include the whole path of the station during each 15 second exposure.  it worked pretty well, though i could have zoomed in a little more, and will do so if i get a next time opportunity.  
   i took four photos.  and did get the station's path for the full 15 seconds in each of the four shots, rotating the camera from wnw to ne a bit for each shot.  it was nice.  i did not see any unusual lights in the sky with my naked eye as i took these photos, and neither did my wife or our neighbor.
   the led or lcd viewing screen on my camera isn't real big, though i can zoom in when viewing it, and i was able to see that i did get the line of light of the station's path during the exposure.  in the first two photos (wnw and nw), i noticed another light in the sky (in the photo) that i hadn't seen with my eyes, or in the screen viewfinder.  and in the 4th photo (more ne) i noticed orbs near the power line tower.  when i uploaded the photos to my laptop, and could crop and enlarge them, i was amazed to see that yellow-green light/shape in the first two photos.  overlapping the path of the station in the first photo, then obviously in the second shot, it hadn't moved like the station had.  it was still in the same place, same shape, etc.  then i saw the orbs in the 4th photo.  there's a string of power lines immediately north of the apartment building we live in.  one orb was pretty bright... the one by the tower, and there was at least one other orb, in the lower left of the photo.  i've photographed orbs before, but never that big.
   i post a lot of nature and moon photos on facebook, and someone suggested i sent these to you.  i'm sending you the uncropped, original photos.  i figure you can zoom in on them as you please.  i'd be glad to send you the cropped ones, but doubt that will be needed.
content.summary: 15 sec time exposures of iss crossing sky.. 3 of the 4 photos showed objects i did not see with naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in north central florida.
i was watching the baseball game friday night oct 11, 2013 & went out on the back porch for a cigarette. as soon as i sat at the table i saw 4 maybe 5 orange / red lights traveling in a line above the trees. i freaked!

i ran over & banged on the window to get my wife's attention. she came out, i pointed to the lights as i ran & grabbed my video camera. she said " wow, that's not a plane." i went out into the yard to avoid the screens on the pourch & the bright light on the barn next door.

the lights were very far away & probably 4 or 5 times larger than a star. they were traveling slowly. they came up above the trees out of the nw and were going at a slight angle to the north.

as they ascended, the upper most light faded away as did the others as they got to the same spot in the sky. i thought that was it, but a few minutes later, it started again. first one light then another. only 3 this time.

they didn���t fade as quickly this time & seemed to reach a certain altitude then started heading north. the spacing between them also grew as they started north.They may have changed to a bluish color as they faded away this time. (it was hard to tell as i was focused on the screen of the video camera).

i have worked on military aircraft in the past, worked on the flight line at night & was at sea. no way were these lights from any type of plane or helicopter.

i wish i had a tripod!
content.summary: 4 orange lights rising from the horizon in a straight line. they slowly faded away, but the even started again a few minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 5:20 when my mother and i were sitting down in the den to eat supper and watch the football games on tv....My chair faces ne and we have a huge glass sliding door looking from ne to se toward the ocean...We live directly on the beach....As i was watching tv, i noticed something glowing about 30 degrees off the horizon ne about a eighth of a mile out moving slowly about 10 or 12 miles an hour moving towards the se...I got the binoculars and focused in and saw a round object, maybe 10 to 15 feet in diameter looking almost clear like the clouds around it to a very intense red and orange pulsating glow....It would look almost clear, then slowly get very red and orange like it was on fire, but no flames or smoke could be seen...There was absolutely no noise....My mother went back inside, and i stayed focused on the object as it moved through the clouds and then as i was about to stop looking, it went from pulsating to the blackest thing i have ever seen in the sky....It looked like a huge piece of charcoal....It was unbelievably black and looked very strange against the light to medium grey clouds around it.....I finally lost sight of it as it moved further and further away heading se away from land and toward the open ocean.
content.summary: Saw a pulsating red and orange light moving through the clouds over the ocean

content.detailedDescription: To this day i still want to know and see what this was,seen thousands of planes flyover valley,been to air shows,but  this was very strange. thought maybe balloon but balloons don't  fly against  the  jet stream. i've seen lights at night around that seem not to belong, but to this day i see this in my minds eye. took about thirty or so stills with my canon rebel no video cuz the card wouldn't handle it. but i don't know i wasn't gonna send these in  because i'm still having a hard time when i think about it. remember it's coming north up the valley towards scranton then just stops goes west over close to public square.
content.summary: Looked up and saw this black mass ,flying over wyoming valley
